snippet: Connecticut’s women’s basketball team trounced No. 3 Louisville on Monday, its 37th straight win.
abstract: College Basketball Women's Roundup; Connecticut blows out Louisville, 68-48, notching their 37th straight win, third longest streak in school history; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut’s women’s basketball team trounced No. 3 Louisville on Monday, its 37th straight win.

headline.main: Connecticut Finishes Undefeated and Clinches First A.A.C. Title
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Finishes Undefeated and Clinches First A.A.C. Title
